name: Passers-by
description:
Passers-by is a short piece of interactive fiction about romance between an unnamed male protagonist and a lady he falls in love with. There are multiple endings (hint: more than two) - play till you get all of them!

Feel the plot is a bit too straightforward? Or can't put your finger on something  that seems odd? Think harder. Play again.

And more importantly, what on earth does that last scene mean?!
Did you find the hidden true end?

Let me know your thoughts in the comments section below (though please hide any spoilers so that other players can enjoy the gameplay experience first-hand)!

P.S. This is my first Ren'Py game :) Plot, images and music are all created by me. Game concept is inspired by DDLC. Enjoy!

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Doki_Doki_Literature_Club! by Team Salvato

Updates:

  1. Version 2.0: Changes made to game format, interface, menu design, soundtracks.
